title: Analytic properties of Speyer's $g$-polynomial of uniform matroids
authors: Rong Zhang and James Jing Yu Zhao
abstract:
Let $U_{n,d}$ denote the uniform matroid of rank $d$ on $n$ elements. We
obtain some recurrence relations satisfied by Speyer's $g$-polynomials
$g_{U_{n,d}}(t)$ of $U_{n,d}$. Based on these recurrence relations, we prove
that the polynomial $g_{U_{n,d}}(t)$ has only real zeros for any $n-1\geq d\geq
1$. Furthermore, we show that the coefficient of $g_{U_{n,[n/2]}}(t)$ is
asymptotically normal by local and central limit theorems.
